Key Match Events: Pakistan successfully chased down a target of 344, which was a new record for the team
Kusal Mendis scored 122 off 77 balls but was dismissed, setting up the chase
Babar Azam was dismissed for 10, but Pakistan adapted and formed a deep partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan expressed pride in the team's resilience after the win
Pakistan's victory was seen as a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a high-scoring ODI
Pakistan's win put them second in the table behind New Zealand on net run rate
Others: The physio Cliff Deacon helped Mohammad Rizwan manage cramps during the innings
Pakistan's next match was against India in Ahmedabad
